page.title: 16DALLAM SCHOOL
page.content: Dallam was established in September 1984,having been set up as a voluntary aided comprehensive and co_educational school to meet the needs,interests and abilities of all its pupils between the ages of 11 and 19.Formed from Heversham Grammar School and Milnthorpe Community College,the new school has a most promising and exciting future:merging the reputations,staffs and facilities of a long established grammar school and a thriving community college provided the best elements for a school which is to serve the purposes and challenges that face education in the 1980's and far beyond.As an added strength,the boarding tradition of Heversham continues,bringing in pupils from beyond our catchment area and thereby enlarging the horizons and experiences of all at the school.
